Name: London Scramble
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. DRIZZLE créme de mûre over drink (will slowly bleed through the cocktail).
Review: A tequila Bramble of which I'm sure Dick Bradsell (the legendary bartender behind the original Bramble) would be most approving.
History: Created in 2007 by Dre Masso and Henry Besant , who, back then, were the Worldwide Cocktail Club .
Nutrition: One serving of London Scramble contains 200 calories
